inclusion.criterion: Rome IV criteria for IBS diagnosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Investigation to exclude other gastrointestinal organic cause(s)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Use of antibiotics or probiotics within 1 month prior to FMT
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Co-morbidity: kidney failure or chronic heart disease
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Serious psychiatric disorders or drug abuse
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has abdominal pain and vomiting, with a history of alcohol consumption and smoking. He is healthy with no history of allergies or using any medications.
